::Dark Rodimus/Lord Jhiaxus/Zarak::
   
  The crew all draw their assorted weapons and begin to search. Dark Rodimus is moving much slower as he is closely inspecting all around.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          OOC: Of I started the topic

Hydras/Perceptor

Perceptor looked to dark Rodimus and said "LEt's go to check this 
place, he must have had other gifts around"

Hydras opened comlink to TRelos and said "TRelos have you found 
something?" and looking to Jhiaxus and Zarak said "Be ready we 
couldnt know what kindo of gifts the intruder left us"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:
>
> The computer room is dark, but Trelos still manages to see where he 
is
> going by the glow of the computer screens.
> 
> As he slinks accross the floor, he still hears a sound of fingers
> moving with a slight metalic click with each motion.
> 
> Under the desk he suddenly senses movement and instinctively leaps 
in
> that direction jaws bared. A spider-like probe scurries from its
> hiding spot under the desk out into the room.
> 
> In a single bound Trelos jumps to the center of the room and in 
front
> it. It leaps at Trelos only to be ripped in half by his powerful 
jaws
> and thrown against a wall, smashing several computer screens.
> 
> He jumps up on the desk where it landed, destroying more equipment 
and
> continues to rip apart the spiderbot until it ceases to move.
> 
> He quickly becomes bored and leaves the room in search of more prey.
> 
> 
> 
> OOC: ok, that was confusing with the post titles. It probably would
> have been better to start a new thread; posting accross several
> threads was pretty difficult to follow.
> 
> Teleportation??? that's a new one for me.
> 
> On 2/16/08, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
> >
> > --- Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
> >
> > > OOC: Preston, do we have ourselves Skywarp rebuilt in a Armada
> > > Starscream like body?
> >
> > OOC: I did not intend to, but its open. He is Nightrazor, the 
minion
> > created by Cyclonus from the soldiers found in a decepticon 
shuttle
> > that crashed on Earth. I did base his form on Skywarp and he does
> > posses many of his abilities, so I will not actually close that 
avenue
> > if you want to explore it.
> >
> > BTW there is a Skywarp that is a recolor of Armada Starscream, 
which is
> > where I got the pic for Nightrazor.
> >
> > Preston
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
